summary: This is an email transmitting the Lieutenant's log and daily activities report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York for July 21, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death. It appears to be part of the document production related to the investigation into his death.

events.title: Daily Activities at MCC New York
events.description: The Lieutenant's log and daily activities report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York was generated, documenting operations and events at the facility.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center
locations.context: Federal detention facility in New York where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 22, 2019, transmitting the daily log and activities report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) for July 21, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein died in his cell at the MCC on July 23, 2019, making this report from the day before his death potentially significant for investigations.
The document is marked as CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the Southern District of New York (SDNY) document production related to the Epstein case.
The specific file references (SDNY_00008766, EFTA00139266) indicate it is part of a larger collection of released documents.
